title: Ted Cruz vs Movies, Escobar Yayo Hippos 2.12.21
itunes:title: Ted Cruz vs Movies, Escobar Yayo Hippos 2.12.21
description:
In episode 811, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Kyle Ayers to discuss how Covid-19 deaths could have been avoided, the Trump impeachment trial, QAnon losing its cool, some Republicans believing violence is necessary, Pablo Escobar's hippos, The Princess Bride cast hating Ted Cruz, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Lancet Study Finds 40 Percent of U.S. COVID-19 Deaths Could Have Been Avoided
  2. The Trump Impeachment Evidence
  3. Proud Boys Member Says Trump to Blame for Inciting Capitol Riot
  4. Less than 10% of Americans like QAnon
  5. A 'Scary' Survey Finding: 4 In 10 Republicans Say Political Violence May Be Necessary
  6. Pablo Escobar: Why scientists want to kill Colombia's hippos
  7. Ted Cruz Called Out by 'Watchmen' Writer for Misunderstanding the Comic
  8. Inconceivable! 'Princess Bride' Fan Ted Cruz Criticizes Cast Support For Democrats
  9. Mandy Patinkin: The Real Politics in The Princess Bride
  10. Why The Princess Bride Is a Perfect Fantasy Movie
  11. WATCH: Azymuth - Rico Suave Bossa Nova

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
